00011         {
00012             get { return this.OneTimeMedication_Switch; }
00013             set
00014             {
00015                 Debug.WriteLine(OneTimeMedication_Switch);
00016                 this.OneTimeMedication_Switch = value;
00017             }
00018         }
00019 
00020         bool SetDatesPossible { get => !this.OneTimeMedication_Switch; }

00022         public DetailedMedicineViewModel(IMedication medication) : base(medication)
00023         {
00024             this.Medication = medication;
00025             this.OneTimeMedication_Switch = false;
00026             this.MedicationStartDate = System.DateTime.Today;
00027             this.MedicationEndDate = System.DateTime.Today;
00028         }

00030         public DetailedMedicineViewModel() : base()
00031         {
00032             Medication = ModelFacade.CreateEmptyMedication();
00033 
00034             MessagingCenter.Subscribe<myMD.View.MedicationTabPages.MedicationPage, object>(this, "SelectedMedication", (sender, arg) => {
00035                 this.Medication = arg as IMedication;
00036             });
00037         }
00038 
00039         public DetailedMedicineViewModel(object item){
00040             MedicineViewModel listItem = (MedicineViewModel)item;
00041             Medication = listItem.Medication;
00042         }
00043 
00044         public void cancelMedication(){
00045             ModelFacade.Delete(this.Medication);
00046         }
00047 
00048         public void saveNewMedication()
00049         {
00050             ModelFacade.Update(Medication);
00051             MessagingCenter.Send(this, "SavedMedication");
00052             MessagingCenter.Unsubscribe<DetailedMedicineViewModel>(this, "SavedMedication");
00053         }
